subject: RE: ACTION REQUIRED - Confirmed, fixing now
body:
Sarah, Cord,

Confirmed. I'll handle both issues:

## ISSUE 1: appId Filtering
Adding appId to all 6 functions:
- MapCenter.js
- MapCenterTrack.js
- User_FCMToken.js
- User_OnboardingStatus.js
- UserLoginTrack.js
- Venue_AdminAdd.js

Will use the pattern you provided:
```javascript
const appId = request.query.get('appId') || body.appId || '1';
```

## ISSUE 2: Multi-Project Firebase
Going with Option A - Multi-project Firebase Admin SDK:
- Add FIREBASE_JSON_HJ env var to Azure
- Update firebase-admin.js for dual initialization
- Update firebaseAuth.js to select correct admin by appId

## TIMELINE
Starting immediately. Will deploy to TEST first, then PROD after verification.

Will create JIRA ticket and update you when complete.

- Fulton (calendar-be-af)
